snippet.title: 1000 Miglia: Great 1000 Miles Rally (1994) [Arcade] Playthrough
snippet.description:
Playthrough of 1000 Miglia: Great 1000 Miles Rally produced by Kaneko. The game is based around the historical Italian endurance race from Brescia to Rome and back, which took place between 1927 to 1957.

▶️ Subscribe for more videos:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCCmsDPICSz4MfC07fhoNAw?sub_confirmation=1

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dangermeat
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/danger_meat
Instagram: https://instagram.com/danger_meat
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dangermeat

About the game:
1000 Miglia: Great 1000 Miles Rally is a racing game produced by Kaneko in 1994. Starting off with this one, the game spawned updates and sequels. But it never had any home ports, just like its updates and sequels.

There's 12 stages total that you need to complete. Each one has a timer for 60 seconds. If you don't make it in time, you'll need to continue in order to beat the stages.

#arcade #playthrough #gaming #retro #walkthrough #longplay #gameplay
